title: IEA's Fmr. Oil Head: China Doesn't Need Venezuelan Oil
description: Neil Atkinson, visiting fellow at the National Center for Energy Analytics and former IEA oil markets chief, says Venezuela’s oil industry has severely deteriorated. He tells Katie Greifeld and Romaine Bostick on “The Close” that China’s involvement is driven more by political influence than oil demand. (Source: Bloomberg)
